titles.title: NARUTO-ナルト- 木ノ葉新伝 湯煙忍法帖
Naruto: Konoha's Story - The Steam Ninja Scrolls: The Manga

title: Naruto: Konoha Shinden - Yukemuri Ninpouchou
title_english: Naruto: Konoha's Story - The Steam Ninja Scrolls: The Manga
title_japanese: NARUTO-ナルト- 木ノ葉新伝 湯煙忍法帖
synopsis:
Lively teenager Mirai Sarutobi is determined to become a respected ninja, aspiring to match the legacies of her late father, Asuma, and grandfather, Third Hokage Hiruzen. As a regular bodyguard for Seventh Hokage Naruto Uzumaki, the active village leader, she feels she is steadily progressing toward her goal. When entrusted with escorting Sixth Hokage Kakashi Hatake during a border inspection, an eager Mirai senses a chance to establish her reputation by defending Kakashi against countless enemies. But what she anticipates to be a perilous, career-defining two-day mission turns out to be a leisurely 20-day vacation.

Reeling from her disappointment, Mirai struggles to enjoy touring hot springs alongside the absent-minded Kakashi and his overzealous friend Guy Might. As Mirai finally relaxes, however, she is suddenly offered a tantalizing opportunity—one that may just be too good to be true.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: Naruto: Konoha Shinden - Yukemuri Ninpouchou was released to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the Naruto anime. It is set approximately between the end of the Naruto parent series and the beginning of the Boruto: Naruto Next Generations sequel. The series was published digitally as an English simulpub as Naruto: Konoha's Story - The Steam Ninja Scrolls: The Manga through MANGA Plus. The volumes were published by VIZ Media under the Shonen Jump imprint from July 9, 2024, to October 8, 2024. It has also been published in German by Carlsen since July 2, 2024.
